description: Translate only rows where dist_type_1 is not NULL

translation_rules: padConcat({inventory_id, src_filename, map_sheet_id, orig_stand_id, ogc_fid}, {4,15,10,10,7}, {'x','x','x','x','x'}, '-', TRUE, TRUE)
description: Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID
Maps source value to DIST_TYPE_1 using lists of values
Copies year if not null, empty and between 1000-2020. Catch zero values as nulls.
Maps extent range to upper. Catch zero values as nulls.
Maps extent range to lower. Catch zero values as nulls.
